articles.description: Rapper PnB Rock, 30, was fatally shot during a robbery at Roscoe's Chicken & Waffles in Los Angeles on Monday after posting a video on Instagram showing off diamond chains.
articles.content: Rapper PnB Rock posted a video to his Instagram showing off diamond chains just before being shot and killed in a robbery at a chicken eatery in Los Angeles after his girlfriend gave away their locat… [+7264 chars]

articles.title: Piers Morgan suggests Prince Harry should ‘rein in his royals-trashing wife’ - The Independent
articles.description: ‘Harry, if you really want to honour your dad, nix your salacious tell-all and rein in your royals-trashing wife,’ Morgan titled his column
articles.content:
Piers Morgan has once again lashed out at the Duke and Duchess of Sussex in his latest newspaper column in the wake of Queen Elizabeth IIs death.

articles.description: "I don't want to live in a world that doesn't let Jennifer Coolidge speak as long as she wants."

articles.title: Guinness World Record holders create huge mural of Queen outside Tube station - My London
